# MAF V11.0.0 - Bulletproof Framework
# Multi-Agent Framework Documentation Index

## Core Framework (LOCKED - Never Modify)
- /core/SAFETY-PROTOCOL.md - 109 forbidden operations
- /core/GATE-SYSTEM.md - 8-gate quality system
- /core/APPROVAL-LEVELS.md - L0-L5 human approval matrix
- /core/EMERGENCY-LEVELS.md - E1-E5 emergency procedures
- /core/FMEA.md - 17 failure modes analyzed

- /database/schema/002-maf-v11-seed-data.sql - Seed data
